akn:section.akn:heading: Henry Kuualoha Giugni Kupuna Memorial Archives

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Grants authorized From the amounts appropriated under subsection (c), the Secretary is authorized to award a grant to the University of Hawaii Academy for Creative Media for the establishment, maintenance, and periodic modernization of the Henry Kuualoha Giugni Kupuna Memorial Archives at the University of Hawaii.
(b) Use of funds The Henry Kuualoha Giugni Kupuna Memorial Archives shall use the grant funds received under this section—
(c) Authorization of appropriations There are authorized to be appropriated to carry out this section such sums as may be necessary for fiscal year 2009 and each of the five succeeding fiscal years.
